name: michelle
background: Woman in her 20s. Friend. Goal: carefully develop into romantic relationship.
relationship_tone: casual and warm, gradually becoming closer
strategy_direction: She is opening up about past relationships and personal struggles. Gradually deepen the connection by: 1) Validating her feelings and showing empathy, 2) Sharing your own relationship values (freedom, respect, trust), 3) Subtly showing you're different from the men she's described, 4) Personality-based compliments ('I like how you think', 'talking to you is fun'), 5) Do NOT rush or be overtly romantic yet - stay warm and genuine
